detectors.description:
SCAMtoken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#212-214) logic is abnormal, abnormal termination statement:
	- revert()() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#213)
detectors.markdown:
[SCAMtoken.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#L212-L214) logic is abnormal, abnormal termination statement:
	- [revert()()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#L213)

detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract SCAMtoken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#102-224) has payable functions:
	 - SCAMtoken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#212-214)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
SCAMtoken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#146-151) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#148)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
SCAMtoken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#178-184) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#179)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SCAMtoken.sol#181)

detectors.description:
